0.name: Last Gasp
0.description: Completely restores engine boost for the last attacking flight.

1.name: Improved Engine Boost
1.description: Increase engine boost time of the carrier's squadron.

2.name: Engine Techie
2.description: Reduce the cooldown time of squadron's Engine Cooling.

4.name: Direction Center for Fighters
4.description: Provide an additional fighter for carrier's patrol fighters.

5.name: Search and Destroy
5.description: Extends the patrol radius of squadron's Patrol Fighter or Interceptors.

6.name: Torpedo Bomber
6.description: Shortens the aerial torpedo's arming distance.

9.name: Repair Specialist
9.description: Provide an additional and longer action time of squadron's In-Flight Repair consumable.
9.effect:
In-Flight Repair: +1 charge
In-Flight Repair action time: +10%

10.name: Secondary Armament Expert
10.description: Improves secondary battery reload time, continuous AA damage, and flak AA damage.
10.effect:
Secondary battery reload time: -10%
Continuous AA damage: +10%
Flak AA damage: +10%
Depth charges damage: +10%

11.name: Patrol Group Leader
11.description: Provide an additional fighter for squadron's Patrol Fighter or Interceptor consumable.

12.name: Sight Stabilization
12.description: Reduce time to reach the smallest reticle for attacking squadrons.
12.effect:
Attacker aiming speed: +7.5%
Torpedo bomber aiming speed: +7.5%
Bomber aiming Speed: +7.5%

13.name: Enhanced Armor-Piercing Ammunition
13.description: Increase damage of aerial AP armaments.
13.effect:
AP rocket damage: +3%
AP bomb damage: +3%

14.name: Pyrotechnician
14.description: Increase chance of causing fire with aerial bombs and rockets.
14.effect:
HE rockets fire chance: +1%
HE bombs fire chance: +5%

15.name: Aircraft Armor
15.description: Reduce intake of continuous AA damage for squadrons.

17.name: Interceptor
17.description: Replace Patrol Fighters consumable with Interceptors.
17.effect:
Interceptor patrol radius: +10%
Cannot attack enemy fighters.
Cannot spot enemy ships.

19.name: Proximity Fuze
19.description: Decreases Torpedo Protection of target struck by torpedo.

20.name: Close Quarter Expert
20.effect:
Secondary battery range: +20%
Secondary battery dispersion: -30%

22.name: Hidden Menace
22.description: Decreases concealment at the cost of squadron return speed.
22.effect:
Detection range: -15%
Damage Control Party cooldown: -20%
Safe Altitude: -50%
Speed of returning squadrons: -50%

23.name: Enhanced Reaction
23.description: Time for Patrol Fighters and Interceptors to start engaging enemy aircraft reduced.
23.effect:
Time before attacking: -80%
Time to Arrive: +50%
Action time of consumable: +25%

24.name: Gun Feeder
24.description: Accelerate shell type switching if all main battery guns are reloaded.
24.effect: -40% to reload time when shell type is switched

25.name: Demolition Expert
25.description: Increase chance of causing fires on enemy ships.
25.effect:
HE fire chance for main and secondary battery: +1%
Depth charges explosion radius: +15%

26.effect:
Catapult Fighter: -10% cooldown time
Spotting Aircraft: -10% cooldown time
Main Battery Reload Booster: -10% cooldown time
Torpedo Reload Booster: -10% cooldown time
Defensive AA FIre: -10% cooldown time

27.name: Emergency Repair Specialist
27.description: Reduce cooldown time of Damage Control Party and Repair Party.
27.effect:
Damage Control Party cooldown: -3%
Repair Party cooldown: -3%

28.name: Incoming Fire Alert
28.description: Warns of long-range main battery shells.
28.effect: Receives a warning of a salvo fired at your ship from a distance longer than 4.5km

29.name: Preventive Maintenance
29.description: Reduces the risk of main turrets, torpedo tubes, steering gear, and engine becoming incapacitated.

Fire duration: -15%
Flooding duration: -15%
Module incapacitation duration: -15%

Dispersion of incoming shells: +5% per active fire
